p: The manuscript as well as the biological assays, data entry and analysis were done by SAA and IIA. IIA collected the plant materials and performed the plant extraction and fractionation. MSA critically reviewed the draft manuscript and participated in the study design and data analysis. All authors contributed to data analysis, drafting or revising the article, have agreed on the journal to which the article will be submitted, gave final approval of the version to be published, and agree to be accountable for all aspects of the work.
